items.title: LSI for Companion-Dependent Geometric Gas
items.content:
4955: :label: conj-lsi-companion-dependent-full
4956: 
4957: We conjecture that under the assumptions of {prf:ref}`thm-main-complete-cinf-geometric-gas-full`, the Geometric Gas satisfies a **Logarithmic Sobolev Inequality** with constant $\alpha > 0$:
4958: 
4959: $$
4960: \text{Ent}_\mu(\rho) \leq \frac{1}{\alpha} \mathcal{E}(\rho, \rho)
4961: 
4962: $$
4963: 
4964: where:
4965: - $\text{Ent}_\mu(\rho) = \int \rho \log(\rho/\mu) d\mu$ (relative entropy)
4966: - $\mathcal{E}(\rho, \rho) = -\int \rho \mathcal{L}_{\text{geo}} \log \rho \, d\mu$ (Dirichlet form)

4952: ## 15. Logarithmic Sobolev Inequality
4953: 
4954: :::{prf:conjecture} LSI for Companion-Dependent Geometric Gas
4955: :label: conj-lsi-companion-dependent-full
4956: 
4957: We conjecture that under the assumptions of {prf:ref}`thm-main-complete-cinf-geometric-gas-full`, the Geometric Gas satisfies a **Logarithmic Sobolev Inequality** with constant $\alpha > 0$:
4958: 
4959: $$
4960: \text{Ent}_\mu(\rho) \leq \frac{1}{\alpha} \mathcal{E}(\rho, \rho)
4961: 
4962: $$
4963: 
4964: where:
4965: - $\text{Ent}_\mu(\rho) = \int \rho \log(\rho/\mu) d\mu$ (relative entropy)
4966: - $\mathcal{E}(\rho, \rho) = -\int \rho \mathcal{L}_{\text{geo}} \log \rho \, d\mu$ (Dirichlet form)
